posts.post_title: help me complete my back collection!
posts.post_content:
Still looking for seymour throwing with the following backs....

Lenox
Red Hindu
Old Mill
Drum
Uzit
Cycle
Piedmont fact 42


If you have any of these Id be very happy to purchase them from you...

please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]

One last shake of the t206 seymour throwing tree...

Any board member willing to sell or trade seymour throwing with any of the following backs would be a great help to my ongoing search for 1 of each back...

Heres the backs I need:

Old Mill
Red Hindu
Drum.. I know the owner has to be a board member :)
Lenox
Uzit .....does this exist?
EPDG... not sure if this exists.
Pied 460 Fact 42

I can trade.. drum backs and cash...if an Uzit or Drum owner is willing to swap.

Thanks for your consideration
Jamie
